title: Order Splatling
content:
The Order Splatling is a splatling in Splatoon 3 that is exclusively used in Side Order.

- 1 Appearance

- 2 Description

- 3 Gallery

- 4 Names in other languages

The Order Splatling has a minimalist appearance, with a white molded piece for the barrel and handle of the weapon, as well as a metallic silver ink tank and nozzle. Its appearance is similar to that of a Heavy Splatling. When firing, ring-shaped holograms manifest around the nozzles of the Splatling.

The Order Splatling is a weapon unlocked in Side Order, and is part of DJ Octavio's Palette. Its base set consists of Splash Walls and Booyah Bomb. However, this can be changed in the Spire of Order by using a vending machine.

It has lower stats in comparison to the Heavy Splatling, with lower damage, strafe speed, ink efficiency, range, and charge time. However, this can be upgraded through color chips in the Spire of Order.
